mil6.4.1:5.2: dāsikaputtā bhaṭiputtā → dāsaputtā bhaṭṭiputtā (bj, pts-vp-pli1); dāsaputtā bhattiputtā (maku) | soreyyakā → soraṭṭhakā (bj, pts-vp-pli1); kosambhakā (maku) | loke → loke agadā (bj, maku, pts-vp-pli1)
mil6.4.1:23.3: ativirocati → atirocati (bj, maku, pts-vp-pli1) | abhibhavitvā → atisayitvā (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
mil6.4.1:25.3: na saṇṭhanti → na saṇṭhahanti (bj, maku); na saṇthanti (pts-vp-pli1) | na upalimpanti → na upalippanti (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
mil6.4.1:34.1: acchambhito → asambhīto (bj, pts-vp-pli1); asambhīto va (maku) | vinivijjhissāmī’ti → vijjhissāmīti (bj)
mil6.4.1:57.3: uttame damme → uttame dhamme (bj, pts-vp-pli1); uttamadhammā (maku)
mil6.4.1:59.1: atulaguṇā → atuliyaguṇā (bj, pts-vp-pli1, mr); atuliyā guṇa (maku)
mil6.4.1:64.1: ṭhānāṭṭhānakusalā → nidānapaṭhanakusalā (bj, pts-vp-pli1); nidānavatthukusalā (maku) | ti → rūpadakkhāti (bj, maku, pts-vp-pli1)
